rules.rule: Do it manually the first three times
rules.detail: If the workflow is still changing, wait until it stabilizes before writing glue code.

rules.rule: Automate when the error cost is higher than the build cost
rules.detail: Log every mistake. When two identical mistakes happen, the script becomes mandatory.
